          <title>
            <string language="fr">L'ombre portée un cube</string>
            <string language="en">The shadow cast by a cube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Schatten warf durch einen Würfel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A sombra moldou por um cubo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'ombra ha lanciato da un cubo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σκιά που πετιέται από έναν κύβο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La sombra echada por un cubo</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme prouve que l'ombre portée d'un cube sur un écran est carrée.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that a cube casts a square shadow on a screen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cube</string>
            <string language="en">cube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lampe</string>
            <string language="en">Lamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="fr">ombre</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ombre carrée</string>
            <string language="en">square shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß ein Würfel einen 
quadratischen Schatten auf einem Bildschirm wirft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que um cubo molda uma sombra
quadrada em uma tela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che un cubo lancia un'ombra 
quadrata su uno schermo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι ένας κύβος πετά μια 
τετραγωνική σκιά σε μια οθόνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que un cubo echa una sombra
cuadrada en una pantalla.</string>
          </description>
